mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_user_account_book( userId, giftId, sendGiftNum, giftPackagePreRemainNum, changeGiftNum, giftPackageSufRemainNum, preRemainGolds, changeGolds, sufRemainGolds, sourceId, sourceDesc, recordTime, content ) VALUES ( #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{giftId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendGiftNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{giftPackagePreRemainNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{changeGiftNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{giftPackageSufRemainNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{preRemainGolds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{changeGolds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sufRemainGolds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sourceDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recordTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
